Arithmetic Operators.name: Add
Arithmetic Operators.description: Calculates the sum of two numbers.

Arithmetic Operators.name: Subtract
Arithmetic Operators.description: Calculates the difference between two numbers.

Arithmetic Operators.name: Multiply
Arithmetic Operators.description: Calculates the product of two numbers.

Arithmetic Operators.name: Divide
Arithmetic Operators.description: Calculates the quotient of two numbers.

Arithmetic Operators.name: Mod
Arithmetic Operators.description: Calculates the remainder of two numbers.

Comparison Operators.name: Equal
Comparison Operators.description: Evaluates if two values are equal.

Comparison Operators.name: Not Equal
Comparison Operators.description: Evaluates if two values are different.

Comparison Operators.name: Less Than
Comparison Operators.description: Evaluates if the first value is smaller than the second.

Comparison Operators.name: Greater Than
Comparison Operators.description: Evaluates if the first value is larger than the second.

Comparison Operators.name: Less Than or Equal
Comparison Operators.description: Evaluates if the first value is smaller or equal to the second.

Comparison Operators.name: Greater Than or Equal
Comparison Operators.description: Evaluates if the first value is larger or equal to the second.

Logical Operators.name: AND
Logical Operators.description: Evaluates to TRUE if both conditions are true.

Logical Operators.name: OR
Logical Operators.description: Evaluates to TRUE if at least one condition is true.

Other Operators.name: Parentheses
Other Operators.description: Defines the order in which expressions are evaluated.

Other Operators.name: Concatenate
Other Operators.description: Joins two or more strings together into a single string.
